name: TI_2_1_2_4_User_Request_to_Change_Password_Security_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.2.4 User Request to Change Password Security Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track user request to change password.
purpose: Capture user request to change password, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.4#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of user authentication when user requests password change.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.4#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.4#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.4#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.4#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.4#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.4#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.4#08
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.4#09
statement.requirement: IF password change successful, THEN the system SHALL capture the new password.
